com.rshepard.atm

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rshepard.atm.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger class is used for logging ATM actions and generating receipts one per customer. This is a singleton class with static methods so that only one logger can be instantiated and used across all classes in the package without passing the logger object to every class that uses it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addReceiptTitle(Account account, int transactionNumber)
      Adds a title to the receipt including ATM location, account number, transaction number, and beginning balances for the checking and savings account.
      static void addToBoth(java.lang.String text)
      Adds the text string to both the log and the receipt arraylist
      static void endReceipt(Account account, java.lang.String messageText)
      Adds the footer to the receipt for transactions that are made by the user including the ending balances after transactions are made.
      static void endReceipt(int account, java.lang.String messageText)
      Adds the footer to the receipt for transactions that are cancelled before any transactions are made
      static Logger getInstance()
      Used to create a single Logger object by using an if statement to test if a logger has already been created.
      static void log(java.lang.String text)
      Adds an entry to the log arraylist in the form of a String
      static void printLog()
      Creates a new JFrame windows and prints the contents of the log arraylist to the window
      static void printReceipt()
      Creates a new JFrame windows and prints the contents of the receipt arraylist to the window
      static void receipt(java.lang.String text)
      Adds an entry to the receipt arraylist in the form of a String

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Logger getInstance()
        Used to create a single Logger object by using an if statement to test if a logger has already been created. If so the logger that was created is passed back. If not it creates a new logger and stores it in the logger field
        Returns:
        Returns the Logger that is or was created depending on if it is the first time this method is called

      • addReceiptTitle

        public static void addReceiptTitle(Account account,
                                   int transactionNumber)
        Adds a title to the receipt including ATM location, account number, transaction number, and beginning balances for the checking and savings account.
        Parameters:
        account - An account object that contains the account number to be printed on the receipt
        transactionNumber - Adds the specific transaction number to the receipt

      • endReceipt

        public static void endReceipt(int account,
                              java.lang.String messageText)
        Adds the footer to the receipt for transactions that are cancelled before any transactions are made
        Parameters:
        account - The account number that was accessed
        messageText - The message text that is printed on the receipt

      • endReceipt

        public static void endReceipt(Account account,
                              java.lang.String messageText)
        Adds the footer to the receipt for transactions that are made by the user including the ending balances after transactions are made.
        Parameters:
        account - An account object containing the account number
        messageText - Any additional messages that are added to the receipt when transactions are finished.

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String text)
        Adds an entry to the log arraylist in the form of a String
        Parameters:
        text - The string that is to be added to the log

      • receipt

        public static void receipt(java.lang.String text)
        Adds an entry to the receipt arraylist in the form of a String
        Parameters:
        text - The string that is to be added to the receipt

      • addToBoth

        public static void addToBoth(java.lang.String text)
        Adds the text string to both the log and the receipt arraylist
        Parameters:
        text - The string that is to be added to the log and receipt.

      • printLog

        public static void printLog()
        Creates a new JFrame windows and prints the contents of the log arraylist to the window

      • printReceipt

        public static void printReceipt()
        Creates a new JFrame windows and prints the contents of the receipt arraylist to the window
